section.p: Notifications define how users are informed when a threshold value defined for an alarm is reached or exceeded. In an alarm definition, you can assign one or multiple notifications.
For a notification, you specify the following elements:

li.p: Name. A unique identifier of the notification. The name is offered for selection when defining an alarm.
Type. The notification method to be used. supports Email, WebHook, and PagerDuty.
Address. For Email, the email address to be notified when an alarm is triggered.

p.note: Generic top-level domains such as business domain names are not supported in email addresses (for example, user@xyz.company).

li.p: For PagerDuty, the PagerDuty Service API Key to be notified when an alarm is triggered.
For WebHook, the WebHook URL to be loaded when an alarm is triggered.
Period. For WebHook only. The integer value indicates how often a notification is to be resent.

section.p: To create, edit, and delete notifications, use Monitoring > Notifications.
